value.summary: All six JSON outputs are faithful to the provided report, use only the given constants/equations, and do not fabricate quantitative claims. Calculations for dilution (P01), stoichiometry with purity (P02), titration stoichiometry (P03), bond-energy deltaH estimate (P04), Faraday-law electrolysis mass (P05), and Kc from equilibrium concentrations (P06) are numerically correct and appropriately rounded. Key caveats/instructions from the report are respected (e.g., converting cm3 to dm3 where used,
